title: Hour 1 - Albert Breer (05-28-20)
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Albert Breer (05-28-20)
description:
Albert Breer and Dan talk about the decision by NFL owners not to add the sky judge this upcoming season. Albert tells Dan that he did not know that during the Super Bowl; there is extra officials on the sidelines that communicate with refs during the game.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
